featured.text: The Maasai are a semi-nomadic group in Kenya and northern Tanzania, wandering in bands and living almost entirely on the meat, blood, and milk of their herds.
As the climate became drier and colder, they retreated to a narrow strip along the Pacific coast of Northern California.
The researchers were therefore unable to answer their research questions of whether cattle prefer to look north or south, and whether that differs in the northern and southern hemispheres.
According to the analysis, the 22 between India’s southern and northern tips shrinks by 2 cm every year.

definition.en_def: Relating to the north; situated in the northern part.
definition.example: The northern lights are a spectacular natural phenomenon.
